headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SADLER, RUTH NEE WILLIAMS

snippet: SADLER--Ruth nee Williams. June 14, 1926 - June 9, 2016. Now reunited with her beloved Harry Sadler. Mourned by her children Anne and Tom Reingold, by her grandchildren Maddie and Julia Reingold and Nick Reade, and by her many friends, all treasured her grace and strength. Ruth lived with ardor and died in peace. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SADLER--Ruth nee Williams. June 14, 1926 - June 9, 2016. Now reunited with her beloved Harry Sadler. Mourned by her children Anne and Tom Reingold, by her grandchildren Maddie and Julia Reingold and Nick Reade, and by her many friends, all treasured her grace and strength. Ruth lived with ardor and died in peace. 1/3
